gold.user: A user wants to retrieve a list of all incoming phone numbers associated with their Twilio account to manage their communication channels effectively.
gold.ideal: The API should return a paginated list of incoming phone numbers, including details such as SID, friendly name, phone number, and status.

gold.user: A user needs to fetch the details of a specific incoming phone number to verify its configuration and usage.
gold.ideal: The API should return the details of the specified incoming phone number, including its SID, friendly name, and any associated settings.

gold.user: A user wants to update the friendly name of an incoming phone number to better reflect its purpose in their application.
gold.ideal: The API should successfully update the incoming phone number and return the updated details, confirming the changes made.

gold.user: A user decides to delete an unused incoming phone number to reduce costs and streamline their account.
gold.ideal: The API should confirm the deletion of the incoming phone number and return a success message indicating that the operation was completed.

gold.user: A user wants to create a new incoming phone number for their business to handle customer inquiries more effectively.
gold.ideal: The API should create the incoming phone number and return the details of the newly created number, including its SID and status.
